text: 100px Swimming at the 12th Pan American Games took place March 12–18, 1995 in Mar del Plata, Argentina.For the Record: 1995 Pan American Games Swimming results from Swimming World Magazine, May 1995, p.58. Re-posted on the website of USA Swimming. Retrieved 2011-11-09.
